Uses of Class
org.ensor.threads.biote.BioteManager

  • Packages that use BioteManager 
    Package Description
    org.ensor.robots.network.server
    This package contains the code relating to the robot's network services.
    org.ensor.robots.pathfollower
    This package contains the simulation code required to control a robot to follow a particular path laid out by the navigation system.
    org.ensor.threads.biote
    This package contains a thread handler for handling asynchronous activities.

    • Uses of BioteManager in org.ensor.robots.pathfollower

      Constructors in org.ensor.robots.pathfollower with parameters of type BioteManager 
      Constructor and Description
      DifferentialDriveBiote(BioteManager aBioteManager) 
      PathFollower(BioteManager aBioteManager, int aMover)
      This is a path following Biote which is responsible for receiving a planned path and executing it by sending events to the object responsible for executing the position and direction movement.

    • Uses of BioteManager in org.ensor.threads.biote
